Description.Text: Zolotoy Zaton is a stylish 4-star hotel offering contemporary accommodation in southwest Astrakhan. Highlights include a restaurant, gym and a good location next to the Volga River. Sovetskiy is a pleasant district situated directly alongside the left bank of the Volga River and boasting good road links into central Astrakhan. Nearby places of interest include the Musical State Theater of Opera and Ballet and Our Lady of Assumption church. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Astrakhan destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary, mid-rise building with a graduated layer design. Facilities include indoor and outdoor tennis courts, a gym and a sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 25sqm and decorated in a modern style with a predominantly white colour scheme. They feature a balcony with views of Volga River. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar and air-conditioning. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. Volga Volga serves European and local cuisine. There is a health bar in the fitness area. Guests can also enjoy a range of live music, snacks and drinks at Caviar bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
